COSMIC-The New Virtual World

The Next Generation Social Media platform that is Made in India!

What is Cosmic?

Cosmic is a Next Generation Socail Media platform made in India. It would have several new features that would make it "The Most Utilitarian" Social Media platform for all our users. The exact details of new features would be announced soon.
So, stay tuned!

Why the name "Cosmic"?

Cosmic is a "multi-functional" platform that would have the potential to fulfil all the needs of its users.A Virtual World is being created here. Hence, the name- "Cosmic" signifying a new virtual world.

Is it Secure?

Yes, we at Cosmic give utmost value to your privacy and security of your data. For doing so, we have established sufficient securtiy controls which protect your data from any external threat. We continue to review our security controls on regular basis to ensure that our platform is immune from any new emerging threat.
